column2: Description of field. Possible choices can be seen in the drop down menus on the web form
Title of project, max 60 alpha-numeric characters plus spaces only
Project description (alpha-numeric characters and spaces only)
PI Name (PI info should be consistent with the VAMPS database)
PI email address (PI info should be consistent with the VAMPS database)
PI institution (PI info should be consistent with the VAMPS database)
Project abstract. Please send the abstract to VAMPS (vamps@mbl.edu)
References for selected manuscripts published that describe the location
Sample ID (user sample name) Alphanumeric and '_' only and must start with a letter, less than 30 characters
Dataset description. A short (1-2 sentences) description of the sample
Tube label. What is written on the sample tube for identification
VAMPS dataset name (can be the same as the Sample ID)
Country (if not international waters). Can be fill out from the form dropdown menu after upload.
Longhurst Zone (if marine). Can be fill out from the form dropdown menu after upload.
Forward PCR Primer. Primer sequence or Primer id, e.g., 518F; none if shotgun metagenomic
Reverse PCR Primer. Primer sequence or Primer id, e.g., 518F; none if shotgun metagenomic
Adapter sequence (a.k.a runkey) Usually 5 nt with or without Ns in front
Isolation and growth condition (reference) (PMID, DOI or URL)
Delta 13C for particulate organic carbon (parts per mil)
Delta 13C for dissolved inorganic carbon (parts per mil)
Sediment or rock age (millions of years (Ma))
NA dyes used for total cell counts
